name: stealthhunt
description:
multiplayer game with recording based story line. You discover storyline as you become good player in game.Hope you like it.

Game is in development Phase so only twenty users at one time accepted.Sorry for inconvenience.

Why this game:-

Well nothing in mind literally right now but wanted to create an artwork that makes you feel and question abstractly.

This is not professional way to put things.Every thought is scattered in description ,bad english but don't know why this is not the apple of design or perfection of IBM or Reliblitity wise Samsung.Just us as human are designed but not to be.So here I present A game more human.
